--CETAS creates external table and stores the data in the ADLS , Blob or HDFS
--https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/t-sql/statements/create-external-table-as-select-transact-sql?view=sql-server-ver16&tabs=powershell
--

--Managed Identity:
--Every resource like ADF/Synapse will have an ID alled Managed ID and will be same as the resource name.
--This an be forund in access blade of eah resource.

--External objects will be under a Schema only
create schema NYCTAXI;

use NYCTAXI;
-- Example is based on AdventureWorks
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE NYCTAXI.PassengerCountStats
    WITH (
            LOCATION = 'filesystem/NYCTaxi/Aggdata/',
            DATA_SOURCE = SaiExternalADLS,
            FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
            ) AS
SELECT PassengerCount,
       SUM(TripDistanceMiles) as SumTripDistance,
       AVG(TripDistanceMiles) as AvgTripDistance
   FROM 
        OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sai2616initialstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/filesystem/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    AS [rows]
        WHERE TripDistanceMiles > 0 AND PassengerCount > 0
        GROUP BY PassengerCount
        ORDER BY PassengerCount
GO
